```{r}
library(trendyy)
library(gtrendsR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ob <- trendy("obama")
get_interest_country(ob)

```
```{r}
search_terms <- c("Glory to Hong Kong", "願榮光歸香港")
gtrends(keyword = search_terms,
        geo = "HK",
        time = "today 12-m") -> output_results



```
